author: Source: Alamogordo Daily News
title: The Hoverboard, a skateboard rolling on one wheel to - Alamogordo Daily News
text:
This is how close we are to riding real Hoverboards Movie 'Back to the Future II' predicted arrival of hoverboards in 2015. Check out this story on AlamogordoNews.com: http://usat.ly/1LL4HXk No, it doesn't actually levitate, but it comes very close to mimicking the device predicted in the movie 'Back to the Future II.'
Start the conversation, or Read more at Alamogordo Daily News.
